title: Scoreboard Flip - Before 10 AM EST (NY)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the tester is located in the Greenwich Mean Time zone (London)
AND the current time in their location is before 10 AM EST (Before 2 PM GMT)
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Games tab OR Home tab
custom_expected: THEN the games and results displayed will be from the previous day

title: Scoreboard Flip - At 10 AM EST (NY)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the tester is located in the Greenwich Mean Time zone (London)
AND the current time in their location is AT exactly 10 AM EST (2 PM GMT)
custom_steps: WHEN the tester views the Games tab or Home tab
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the scoreboard on the Games or Home page flip to the current day

AND all scheduled games appear

title: Ensure all areas of the app show current day's games
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has confirmed the scoreboard flip for their timezone
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views the games displayed on:

Home Tab (with favorite team)
Scores Tab
custom_expected: THEN the games and content displayed match what is displayed on the Home and Games pages when the scoreboard flipped at 10 AM Eastern Standard Time (New York)

title: Scoreboard Flip - Before 10 AM EST (NY)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the tester is located in the Central European Time zone (Paris, Madrid, Rome, Berlin)

AND the current time in their location is before 10 AM EST (Before 3 PM CET)
custom_steps: WHEN the tester views the Games tab or Home tab
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the scoreboard on the Games or Home page display completed games from the previous day

title: Scoreboard Flip - At 10 AM EST (NY)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the tester is located in the Central European Time zone (Paris, Madrid, Rome, Berlin)

AND the current time in their location is AT 10 AM EST (3 PM CET)
custom_steps: WHEN the tester views the Games or Home tabs
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the scoreboard on the Games page flip to the current day

AND all scheduled games appear

custom_steps:

Games Tab

custom_preconds:

custom_steps: WHEN the tester views the Games or Home Tab
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the scoreboard on Games or Home tab flip to the current day

AND all scheduled games appear
